mapper.select: SELECT detail.spu_id as spu_id, detail.title as title, detail.article_number as article_number, p.`value` as value, price.min_price as min_price, price.create_time as create_time, price.trade_type as trade_type FROM product_details AS detail, product_sku AS sku, product_property AS p, product_price_info AS price WHERE detail.spu_id = p.spu_id AND p.property_value_id = sku.property_value_id AND sku.sku_id = price.sku_id AND article_number = #{articleNumber}
